src.memory package

Submodules

src.memory.agent_memory module

Agent Memory module for the AI Agent System.

This module implements the agent-specific memory component that manages context for each agent role.

class src.memory.agent_memory.AgentMemory(config: MemoryConfig)[source]

Bases: object

Agent-specific Memory for the AI Agent System.

The AgentMemory handles: - Agent states: Internal state of each agent - Agent context windows: Context for each agent role - Agent work summaries: Compact representation of agent outputs

Initialize the AgentMemory.

config – Memory system configuration

create_hierarchical_summary(agent_id: str, level: int = 0) → str[source]

Create a hierarchical summary of agent work.

This method generates a summary of the agent’s work at different levels of abstraction, based on the agent’s work summaries.

Parameters:

  • agent_id – The agent identifier

  • level – The summary level (0 = most detailed, higher = more abstract)

Returns:

The hierarchical summary

Return type:

str

src.memory.long_term module

src.memory.memory_manager module

src.memory.short_term module

Short-Term Memory module for the AI Agent System.

This module implements the short-term memory component that handles recent conversations, working memory, and task context.

class src.memory.short_term.ShortTermMemory(config: MemoryConfig)[source]

Bases: object

Short-Term Memory for the AI Agent System.

The ShortTermMemory handles: - Conversation buffer: Recent messages and exchanges - Working memory: Active information for the current task - Task context: Specific context for ongoing tasks

__init__(config: MemoryConfig)[source]
